DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate supplementation vitamin D dose 20.000IU per week 40.000 IU per week result weight loss obese subject compare placebo 1 year .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Obesity With Vitamin D ( 40.000 IE Per Week 1 Year )
DOC.detailed_description: We include 450 obese subject devided 3 group : 40.000IU cholecalciferol per week , 20.000 IU cholecalciferol per week , placebo . All subject give 500 mg calcium per day . There visit every tird month . In addition weight reduction , also evaluate calcium metabolism ( blood test urin sample ) , insulin sensitivity , muscle strenght , blood pressure depression .
DOC.criteria: BMI 30 40 serum calcium < 2.55 mmol/L serious disease reduce kidney function renal stone disease use psychopharmaca use drug weight reduction
